powerpoint: When selecting a slide, focus on the Thumbnails on the left pane of the given screenshot and ensure the target slide is selected.
When determining whether the slide is selected, carefully refer to the provided screenshot.
The slide is selected, the border color is red
When selecting the text, there maybe two candicates from left thumbnail and main pane, please do omit the text in the left thumbnail.
The text being visible cannot to determine the text is selected.
When selecting the text, do not see the text in the left thumbnail.
Do not click the arrow in the Transitions tab to view all effects when the effecsr already can be seen in the screenshot.
The button is visible cannot to determine the button is clicked.
